thread.title: US business inventories rise more than expected in June
thread.title_full: US business inventories rise more than expected in June

title: US business inventories rise more than expected in June
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 13, 2015, 17:43 BST - UK Markets closed US business inventories rise more than expected in June By Michele Maatouk | Sharecast – 45 minutes ago Print 
  US business inventories rose by a seasonally-adjusted 0.8% in June, marking their biggest increase since January 2013, according to data released by the Commerce Department. The figures were well ahead of analysts' expectations for a 0.3% increase, with manufacturing inventories up 0.6% and retail and wholesale inventories both 0.9% higher. 
Business sales, meanwhile, were up 2% in June compared with a 0.4% increase in May. 
Business inventories rose by 3% year-on-year and business sales fell at an annual rate of 2.5%. Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
